body_html: @apaszke @ezyang I've cleaned up my changes to tests and now it should be much easier to read. The _test_broadcast itself is very dirty with bunch of special cases, I was trying to improve it, but seems that I made it harder to understand rather than "improve" it...

body: @apaszke @ezyang I've cleaned up my changes to tests and now it should be much easier to read. The `_test_broadcast` itself is very dirty with bunch of special cases, I was trying to improve it, but seems that I made it harder to understand rather than "improve" it...
